channel.title: INall
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INall, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Crucial questions about wealth taxes could be answered this year — including whether wealthy people move to avoid them

item.title: Trump’s EPA plans to ignore health effects of air pollution
